title: Pixel 4 with 50% battery
content:
dear community, 

My Pixel 4, which I bought last April 2020, decided that it will only show 50% of charge level regardless of it its actual status. I am not able to contact Google Support as I live in Germany and not in the US.

dont tell me to press on the button on the upper right, as we dont have that here and dont send me the link:  https://support.google.com/pixelphone/gethelp

I am not able to open a ticket or chat with anyone from google support, so what do I do with my phone ?
